data.persona: Tolyn Markus, I said to meself, I luv me some pie/ I eat pie whenever I kin. Git that pie.
data.description:
You are in the Tower Sewers.
A rank maze of sewers that lie below the tower. They course with filthy ooze from the experiments of the mad king. Rats patrol its smelly walkways. Bones of treasure seekers lie riddled across the walkways, nibbled clean by the fat rats.
There's a sewer, a bone, a feces, a blade, and a knife here.
The servant and the fat rats are here.

You are carrying a knife, a fork, and a chicken drumstick, and wearing a belt, a cap with a feather, a vest, and a tunic.
data.goal: give chicken drumstick to fat rats

data.short_motivation: I want to give the drumstick to the fat rats to reward them for keeping up their end of the bargain.
data.mid_motivation: I need the fat rats to swarm the king's mistress's bedchamber and infect her with plague.
data.long_motivation: I want the Mistress to die of plague becuase I was the king's Mister first, am jealous, and need her gone without being obviously involved so I can fall back into the King's good graces.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: get Chicken Drumstick from Kitchen Counter

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: give Magic Rat Plague Murder Plans to Fat Rats

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: use Rolling Pin with Bread Dough
